best liked or most enjoyed: This is one of my favorite restaurants.
a person or thing that is best liked or most enjoyed: Those gold earrings are my favorites.
A favorite is also a competitor likely to win: The Chicago Bears are 10-point favorites over the Rams in the Super Bowl.
